title: 区块错误怎么搞
author: MC-骨灰
txt_content:
[sub]ERROR Chunk file at -27,3 is in the wrong location; relocating. (Expected -27, 3, got -10, 27) 21.05 10:31:10 [Server] ERROR Chunk file at -27,2 is in the wrong location; relocating. (Expected -27, 2, got -12, 25) 21.05 10:31:10 [Server] ERROR Chunk file at -27,1 is in the wrong location; relocating. (Expected -27, 1, got -8, 8) 21.05 10:31:10 [Server] ERROR Chunk file at -27,0 is in the wrong[/sub]

大神帮忙看看吧

replies.author: 熊镔
replies.txt_content:
使用MCEdit删除区块
详见教程

replies.author: MC-骨灰
replies.txt_content:
